channel.title: Moparscape client will not download 16mb cache
channel.description:
Ok... when i start moparscape client it starts to download the 16mb cache file, freezes, and closes out.
ive never had this problem before... i am using win xp sp3
i downloaded the cache file from an external source but im not sure wat to do with it
i have made several servers before so i am experienced... i will be able to follow directions
plz help as soon as possibe... i cant wait to start making servers again :D

item.title: Moparscape client will not download 16mb cache
item.dc:creator: @birdman4657 birdman4657
item.description:
@birdman4657 wrote:

thank you, i think my problem is solved…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 11:08:55 pm[/size][hr]Anybody that is reading this… the answer to why your client cant download the required files is because you need to clear you CACHE for you internet browser.

there are a few ways to do this… what i do is download glary utilities and use the erase tracks options (make sure to check the tracks you want to clear)…

post if it works

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape client will not download 16mb cache

item.title: Moparscape client will not download 16mb cache
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In signlink.java, in the ‘findCacheDir’ method, you will see the path that you need to place the cache in.

E.G. C:/WINDOWS/cache/

Read full topic
